Entries.default: "Please, enjoy your stay."
"You and I, we have a mutual friend, do we not?" She grins widely, tongue pressing pink between her teeth.
"Are you ready, aimico? Time is short."
Entries.female: "Are you ready, aimica? Time is short."

Entries.default: "Report to Director Castol once you've learned what you can."
"I'm here at Director Castol's request."
"Good, good." The tension in her shoulders settles, and she hazards a small smile.
"Only bathhouse attendants will be allowed to remain - to ensure their comfort, you understand."
"You can't do this yourself?"

"I have had... dealings with Töla in the past, and I am certain she will recognize me. Hence why I have requested assistance from Director Castol, though it pains me to do so." She grimaces and looks away.
"What do you need me to do?"
"I will disguise you as a bathhouse attendant so you might observe their meeting. With luck and some cunning, you may be able to discover the details of their special 'arrangement.'"
"I'm ready to infiltrate the meeting."
"I'm not ready. I'll be back later."
"Prepare quickly, then. We must not let this opportunity pass us by."
"You will not be able to take your gear, but do not worry - should the situation get out of hand, there will be a stash of weapons hidden in one of the changing booths."
"Remind me what you wanted me to do again?"
"I will disguise you as a bathhouse attendant so you might observe their meeting. With luck and some cunning, you may be able to discover the details of their special 'arrangement.'"
"You will not be able to take your gear, but do not worry - should the situation get out of hand, there will be a stash of weapons hidden in one of the changing booths."
"You're already a spy, so why do you need my help?"

"I have had... dealings with Töla in the past, and I am certain she will recognize me. Hence why I have requested assistance from Director Castol, though it pains me to do so." She grimaces and looks away.
"Gellarde! Then you will take your disguise and I shall take your equipment, ac?" Her voice drops to a conspiratorial whisper.
"Do I have to be unarmed?"
"They will not believe you an attendant if you carry a blade." Her mouth quirks into a playful smile.
"But do not fear, I would not throw you to the wolves. Remember, should you have need of them, there is a stash of weapons in one of the changing booths."
"Take this rice wine as well. Perhaps you will find use of it, eh?" She winks.
"But I am sure it will not come to that." She smiles broadly.
"A Royal Deadfire operative, Quarno, and his Príncipi associate, Töla, will meet tonight to discuss the details of a, ah, business arrangement."
"They have bought out the entire first floor for privacy's sake. Even Ganor, the proprietor, will excuse himself."
"What can you tell me about Quarno?"
"Anything I should know about Töla?"
"He is a snake in the body of a man. Though he is supposedly the Royal Deadfire Company's man, he always seems to be working some deal on the side."
"Töla is fond of drink, and her tongue flaps loosely when she has had too much of it."
"Just tell me what I need to do."
